attributes.action: We call upon HM Government to reject petitions calling for a 2nd EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned object to the petition calling for retrospective rule impositions regarding the EU referendum. We call upon HM Government to begin the process of leaving the European Union immediately.
attributes.background: The majority of the electorate clearly voted in favour of the United Kingdom leaving the European Union. The petition calling for retrospective referendum rule changes is unfair and undemocratic. The wish of the majority to leave the EU should be respected and implemented by parliament.
